name: The blue monkey(mobile version)
description:
Orginal game was made in 3 hours for trijam. This is updated version for Android.

If you want play orginal (not for Android) you can play it here: https://karjalanpiirakka-games.itch.io/the-blue-monke

HOW TO

You are the blue monkey. Use WASD or arrow keys to move. Dont let humans come near of you (Because they want to eat you).

All models and code is made by me.
